column4: is anyone else having trouble getting Breezy-AMD64 to play DVD's?I got it working on Hoary-i386 fine.
has anyone here been able to get a DVD folder to play in Breezy?
ive played dvd's ive copied to hd with dvdrip befor
I don't know what's wrong, I have libdvdcss2, xine, totem-xine, mplayer, and xine-gui and it just refuses to play
i tend to use 'vlc' mainly these days
I tried that earlier, but it didn't work either... maybe I'll reinstall it
